text: Roszyce is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Kłodzko, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately west of Kłodzko, and south of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 167. ==References== Roszyce
title: Roszyce
